pageContent:
SUSHMITA VIJAYKUMAR INAMDAR 
 https://www.linkedin.com/in/sushmita-inamdar-b2515hmk/ 
   sinamdar4@horizon.csueastbay.edu                 +1 (669) 609-4587 
 
 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
• Proactive Java development professional bringing expertise in Java, Spring Boot, SQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript 
and other technologies.  
• Experience in all phases of Software development life cycle (SDLC), which includes User Interaction, requirement 
gathering, Business Analysis/Modeling,   Design/Architecture,   Development, Implementation,   Integration, 
Documentation, Testing and Deployment. 
• Experience in working with different SDLC methodologies like Waterfall, Agile (TDD, SCRUM). 
• Experienced  with J2SE technologies  like  API,  Threads,  Collections,  and  Exception  Handling and J2EE 
technologies like Servlet, Java Beans and Java Message Services. 
• Practical  exposure  on Java  8 features  such  as  Functional  Interface,  lambda  expressions,  Stream  API,  Default

technologies like Servlet, Java Beans and Java Message Services. 
• Practical  exposure  on Java  8 features  such  as  Functional  Interface,  lambda  expressions,  Stream  API,  Default 
methods and Java 11 features such as HTTP Client and new String methods. 
• Practical knowledge and expertise working with frameworks like Spring Core (DI (IOC)), Spring MVC, Spring 
Data, Spring Boot, Spring Batch, Spring Security.  
• Well  versed  with  consuming  and  producing  Web  services  based on SOAP (WSDL Component) and REST 
services while working with data-exchange formats like PLAIN_TEXT, XML and JSON formats. 
• Working experience of Relational DBMS like MySQL, Oracle SQL, PL/SQL, SQLite and DB2. 
• Experience with Tomcat/ WebLogic servers and good understanding of the client HTTP requests.  
• Experience with Microsoft Azure Cloud development and migration. 
• Well experienced in collaborating with Cross-functional teams.

• Experience with Microsoft Azure Cloud development and migration. 
• Well experienced in collaborating with Cross-functional teams. 
• Accomplishes project goals consistently with elegant, scalable code. Works great with team members under Agile 
and Scrum frameworks.  
 
EDUCATION 
• California State University, East Bay    Aug 2021 - May 2023 
Master’s in computer science 
• KLE Technological University, India                                 Aug 2015 - June 2019 
Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering          
 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
Programming Languages Java, C, Python, C#, R, ReactJS, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap. 
Java & J2EE Technologies Java, JDBC, Hibernate, JSP, Spring Framework, Java Beans, Web Services. 
Databases MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, PL/SQL, TOAD, Oracle and Neo4j. 
Web Services SOAP, RESTful, Micro Services, Postman. 
Build Scripts Maven, Gradle, Jenkins. 
Methodologies Agile, Waterfall.

Databases MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, PL/SQL, TOAD, Oracle and Neo4j. 
Web Services SOAP, RESTful, Micro Services, Postman. 
Build Scripts Maven, Gradle, Jenkins. 
Methodologies Agile, Waterfall. 
IDE/ Testing tools Eclipse, Android Studio, IntelliJ, Visual Studio Code. 
Others JUnit, Jenkins, Git Version Control, JIRA, MVC, SonarQube.

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
REACT DEVELOPER INTERN at Liscio Inc., Dublin, CA          April 2022 – March 2023 
• Developed the ‘Create Task’ page using ReactJS and Java, achieving the specified business requirement. 
• Greatly appreciated for reducing the API response time of the application by 30%.  
• Resolved 40% of the bugs during the project deployment. 
 
JAVA DEVELOPER at Infosys Limited, Bengaluru, India.                                                  May 2019 - Aug 2021 
• Built a client application to fetch, create, update, or delete trading deals using Java 11, Spring Boot Framework 
and SOAP API as part of our Proof-of-concept (POC) project. 
• Modernized the existing, obsolete code of the client’s trading deals to a novel, simple codebase using Java 8, Java 
11,  Spring  Boot  Framework  and RESTful API technologies  in Agile  methodology;  greatly  appreciated  for 
minimizing the length and complexity of the code by   75%.

11,  Spring  Boot  Framework  and RESTful API technologies  in Agile  methodology;  greatly  appreciated  for 
minimizing the length and complexity of the code by   75%. 
• Developed stored procedures using PL/SQL to implement specific client business logic. 
• Used Git as the version control tool and Maven, Jenkins as the build and deployment tools. 
• Experienced with the server-side deployment of the code onto Microsoft Azure Cloud and fixed the run-time bugs 
that were arising during the project deployment. 
• Developed the test suites with JUnit and Mockito frameworks. 
• Involved in the production environment support and handled various client tickets. 
• Involved in the software development lifecycle from planning to deployment and maintenance. 
 
INTERN at Infosys Limited, Mysuru, India                                                                             Jan 2019 - May 2019

INTERN at Infosys Limited, Mysuru, India                                                                             Jan 2019 - May 2019 
• Trained on the concepts of Object-Oriented Programming (Java), Python, MySQL Database and C# in the initial 
days.  
• Designed the ‘Virtual Trial Room’ project website using .Net MVC Framework, Tomcat server and a 3-D model 
software that allowed the customers to try a chosen dress on a three-dimensional model that was created based on 
the user measurements; helped increase the customer engagement and reduce returns. 
• Involved closely with the development team members to identify and fix software bugs. 
 
ACADEMIC PROJECTS 
• Email Marketing System.              Nov 2022 
 The  system  stores  the  huge  data  as  nodes and allows  users  to  apply  pattern  recognition,  classification  and 
machine learning to the models using Neo4j database.

 The  system  stores  the  huge  data  as  nodes and allows  users  to  apply  pattern  recognition,  classification  and 
machine learning to the models using Neo4j database.  
 It helps to analyze the customer behavior and decide which offers to target their audiences with. 
 
• Database Management System for Jamba Juice, CSUEB.     Jan 2023 
 Engineered the data for quicker and easy access, to answer business questions with reports, dashboards, and 
data-driven business decisions using MySQL database and JDBC connection for Jamba Juice. 
 Used Splunk to  monitor,  search,  generate reports, visualization, and  errors  of  the  Big  Data  to  analyze  and 
therefore provide business solutions.  
 
HOBBIES AND ACHIEVEMENTS 
• ‘Best Employee of the month – October 2022’ award at Liscio Inc. 
• Love to play badminton, listen to music and hangout with family and friends.
